FusionEngine::ShipInput

FusionEngine::ShipInput Struct Reference

Input state structure for each ship. More...

#include <FusionInputData.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Input state structure for each ship.

This structure has two purposes: 1. as part of FusionShipFrame to syncronise input between client and server, and 2. returned by FusionInput to tell the ClientEnvironment what inputs are currently active (on local hardware) for a specific ship.
